    • 类 LetterBlock

      class LetterBlock extends JTextField implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • BACKGROUND_GREEN
          String BACKGROUND_GREEN
          Hexadecimal color of green blocks.
        • BACKGROUND_GREY
          String BACKGROUND_GREY
          Hexadecimal color of grey blocks.
        • BACKGROUND_YELLOW
          String BACKGROUND_YELLOW
          Hexadecimal color of yellow blocks.
        • FONT_COLOR
          String FONT_COLOR
          Hexadecimal color of white letters.
        • FONT_SIZE
          int FONT_SIZE
          Font size of letters in blocks.
        • LETTER_GREEN
          int LETTER_GREEN
          status==2 means this letter is checked, and should be green.
        • LETTER_GREY
          int LETTER_GREY
          status==-1 means this letter is checked, and should be grey.
        • LETTER_NOT_CHECK
          int LETTER_NOT_CHECK
          status==0 means this letter is not checked.
        • LETTER_YELLOW
          int LETTER_YELLOW
          status==1 means this letter is checked, and should be yellow.

    • 类 Wordle

      class Wordle extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • BLOCK_SIZE
          int BLOCK_SIZE
          The width and height of each letter block.
        • BLOCK_X_PADDING
          int BLOCK_X_PADDING
          The padding between 2 adjacent letter blocks in message textField in x direction.
        • BLOCK_Y_PADDING
          int BLOCK_Y_PADDING
          The padding between 2 adjacent letter blocks in message textField in y direction.
        • bottomMessageField
          MessageTextField bottomMessageField
          A textField at the bottom of window, displays game status to players.
        • CONTENT_WIDTH
          int CONTENT_WIDTH
          The width of 6*5 blocks.
        • LEFT_MARGIN
          int LEFT_MARGIN
          The distance between blocks and left border.
        • LETTER_NOT_CHECK
          int LETTER_NOT_CHECK
          status==0 means this letter is not checked.
        • REGEX
          String REGEX
          A regex expression to judge whether input character is a letter.
        • TOP_FIELD_TOP_MARGIN
          int TOP_FIELD_TOP_MARGIN
          The distance between topMessageField and top border.
        • topMessageField
          MessageTextField topMessageField
          A textField at the top of window, displays specifications of input to players.
        • WINDOW_WIDTH
          int WINDOW_WIDTH
          The width of the entire window.
